sentences.en: Certainly, the lean, shapely, muscular look of the bodybuilder's body is a psychological turn - on.
sentences.cn: 当然, 精益生产 、 匀称的身材 、 肌肉的健美运动员的身体是一种心理上的刺激.

sentences.en: Even now , when I shut my eyes, I can see her proud, shapely form.
sentences.cn: 至于我一闭上眼睛, 就能看见她那高傲而又匀称的身影.

sentences.en: Her large shapely body seemed to relapse naturally into stillness.
sentences.cn: 她的体态动人的高大身子似乎自然而然地陷于静止了.

sentences.en: It was a day in late September, as fragrant and shapely as an apple.
sentences.cn: 时令是九月末.这一天就像一只萍果那样香甜漂亮.

sentences.en: She is a shapely young woman.
sentences.cn: 她是个身材好的年轻女子.

sentences.en: She is tall, slim and shapely.
sentences.cn: 她高高的个子, 苗条的身材,身份好看.

sentences.en: Some clucked that it was a shame her cheeks were becoming brown, her feet less shapely.
sentences.cn: 有的人为她惋惜,说这真是耻辱;脸儿晒黑了, 小脚也不那么细溜.

sentences.en: The cedar was about five feet high and very shapely.
sentences.cn: 那棵雪松约有五尺高,风姿优美.

sentences.en: The porcelain is fashioned with carved moldings that elegantly frame the shapely cut of the basin.
sentences.cn: 这款瓷器具有独特的雕刻风格,面盆盆腔形状优雅.

sentences.en: The still water of the lake mirrored the shapely figure of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 平静的湖水映出山的优美轮廓.

sentences.en: Thethe advantage of shapely configuration , small volume and compact structure.
sentences.cn: 造型美观 、 体积小、结构紧凑.

sentences.en: Thethe advantages of convenient use, time saving, shapely and novel appearance.
sentences.cn: 使用时调节方便 、 省时, 外观新颖别致,美观大方.

sentences.en: What a shame such a shapely sash should such shabby stitches show.
sentences.cn: 如此粗糙的手工想不到能织出这麽美的腰带,真是不好意思啊!

sentences.en: What a shame such shapely sash should such shabby stitches show?
sentences.cn: 这么有形的腰带却用这么破旧的缝线,多丢人啊.

words.tran_cn: 合适的；成某种形状的；有计划的
不成形的；不定形的；不象样的
[电子] 整形器，脉冲整形器；[机] 牛头刨床；造型者；塑造者
形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
发展；成形（shape的过去分词和过去式）
定形的；形状美观的；样子好的；有条理的

trans.tran_cn: <正，褒>（尤指女人的身材或腿）样子好的，匀称的
trans.tran_en: If you describe a woman as shapely, you mean that she has an attractive shape
